title: Face Recognition System
description: Engineered a facial recognition system using CNN-based feature encoding and KNN classification, achieving 96.2% accuracy.

title: Movie Recommendation System
description: Implemented a content-based movie recommender with Flask backend, deployed using Docker on AWS EC2 for scalability.

title: Computerized Gardening System
description: Developed a JavaFX-based smart gardening simulation with automated plant care and SQL-backed data tracking.

title: TAAS Rentals
description: Built a car rental platform with real-time booking, Stripe integration, and responsive UI using React and Node.js.

title: Job Search App
description: Designed a mobile job search app using React Native with Rapid API integration and advanced filtering features.

title: Calories Burnt Prediction
description: Built a machine learning model using XGBoost to predict calorie expenditure, achieving 97.56% accuracy on the RDZSM-232 dataset.
